activities.name: Find Last Execution Date and time

dependsOn.activity: Find Last Execution Date and time

source.sqlReaderQuery: Select max(ModifiedDate) as Last_Modified_Date from saleslt.customer

sqlReaderQuery.value: Select * from saleslt.customer where ModifiedDate > '@{activity('Find Last Execution Date and time').output.firstRow.Prop_0}' and ModifiedDate <=  '@{activity('Find Last Modified Time').output.firstRow.Last_Modified_Date}'

source.sqlReaderQuery: select count(*) as addressRows from saleslt.address

activities.name: Check if address rows greater than 100 or not
Check customer csv file present or not
Check cust file present than save it in sql db

dependsOn.activity: Check customer csv file present or not

expression.value: @activity('Check customer csv file present or not').output.exists

activities.name: Copy Product Model table to ADLS

source.sqlReaderQuery: select count(*) as Count from SalesLT.Product

activities.name: Check if count of product is greater than 10 or not
check cust rows greater than threshold

source.sqlReaderQuery: select count(*) as custRows from SalesLT.Customer
